name: CKOperationGroup
desc: An explicit association between two or more operations.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates an operation group from a serialized instance.

items.name: var defaultConfiguration: CKOperation.Configuration!
items.desc: The default configuration for operations in the group.

items.name: var expectedReceiveSize: CKOperationGroup.TransferSize
items.desc: The estimated size of traffic to download from CloudKit.

items.name: var expectedSendSize: CKOperationGroup.TransferSize
items.desc: The estimated size of traffic to upload to CloudKit.

items.name: var quantity: Int
items.desc: The number of operations in the operation group.

items.name: enum CKOperationGroup.TransferSize
items.desc: Constants that represent possible data transfer sizes.
